author: kkolinko
msg: r1589985 (a followup to r1589980) is also part of the fix for CVE-2014-0119

author: markt
msg: When Tomcat closes the connection based on the HTTP status code of the response, ensure that only one connection header is sent to the client.

author: kwright
msg: Update license text for library download

author: stsp
msg: For issue #4507, "pkg-config support breaks DESTDIR install", prepend
$(DESTDIR) to pkg-config file paths. 'make DESTDIR=/foo install' now
installs pkg-config files within /foo, as intended.

author: reschke
msg: OAK-1860 - change the fixture API to know about whether the persistence will be shared
